definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: The funfair used to take place in the park near her house.
sentences.chinese: 遊藝會過去常在她家附近的公園裏舉行。

sentences.english: For this year's Spring Festival, there will be a provincial gathering for entertainment.
sentences.chinese: 今年春節將舉辦全省規模的遊藝會。

sentences.english: Our village is holding a fete to raise money for the building of the new hall.
sentences.chinese: 我們村裏準備舉行遊藝會，以籌募經費建造禮堂。
